name: TanTan's Bizarre Adventure
description:
In this game, you will be the king of the cup: TanTan. You will lead your soldiers to defeat the corrupted cups in the dungeon.

Randomness: Every time you will get into a random dungeon with random numbers of random enemies. There is no way to predict what the next challenge is. Try to play tactically because you may lose the rewards you got at this time. But of course, high risk comes with a high return!

Strategy: Even though TanTan can summon cup soldiers, TanTan cannot directly attack enemies. You will decide when to protect your soldiers and when to hide behind.

Growth: You can level up TanTan and your cup soldiers with the coins you get from dungeons. Remember, the enemy will get stronger and stronger. You need more powerful troops to pass the dungeon.
